query:
UPDATE projects p
JOIN (
  SELECT projectId, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed
  FROM pages
  GROUP BY projectId
) page_counts ON p.id = page_counts.projectId
SET p.totalPages = page_counts.total, p.processedPages = page_counts.completed;
